Supported Functions¶

Table of Contents

  • ctype.h

  • string.h

  • strings.h

  • stdbit.h

  • stdlib.h

  • inttypes.h

  • stdio.h

  • time.h

  • assert.h

The following functions and headers are supported at least partially on the device. Some functions are implemented fully on the GPU, while others require a remote procedure call.

ctype.h¶

Function Name

Available

RPC Required

✅

isalpha

✅

✅

✅
